thread.section_title: Snug as a Bug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snug as a Bug | snugasabug.com
thread.title: Kathie
thread.title_full: Snug as a Bug reviewed by Kathie

author: Kathie
title: Kathie
text: My kids love the jammies from snug as a bug! I have ordered from them a few times and the quality is excellent and the shipping is fast! The shipping cost is very reasonable as well - I live in a location considered isolated just because of the postal code and many companies want to charge outrageous shipping even though the mail trucks stop at our post office before continuing on to locations not considered isolated. Snug as a bug does not and that is so very appreciated!!
